body_html: @jonghyunc @gunan I can confirm that building TF 1.5 from source with CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5 works fine on Ubuntu 16.04. Works fine for both python 2.7.12 and 3.5.2. Just built today from TF master (latest). A few weird warnings here and there during building and when I run a program, but runs fine. Haven't done any benchmarking yet.

body: @jonghyunc @gunan I can confirm that building TF 1.5 from source with CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5 works fine on Ubuntu 16.04. Works fine for both python 2.7.12 and 3.5.2. Just built today from TF master (latest). A few weird warnings here and there during building and when I run a program, but runs fine. Haven't done any benchmarking yet.
